content.description: <math alttext="2 H O 2 gas reacts to produce H 2 O 2 gas plus O 2 gas " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>H</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: The reaction represented by the chemical equation shown above occurs in Earth’s atmosphere. In an experiment, <math alttext="the molar concentration of H O 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[HO</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math> was monitored over time and the data plotted as shown in the following graph. Based on the information, which of the following is the rate law expression for the reaction?

choices.label: <math alttext="Rate equals k " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>=</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>=</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><mtext>H</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H O 2 squared " overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>=</mtext><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><mtext>H</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H 2 O 2, times the molar concentration of O 2 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msub><mrow><mtext>[H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>][O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H O 2 squared " overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>=</mtext><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><mtext>H</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
